reviews.text:
I love to eat Popeyes chicken but this is a ridiculous one. I love coleslaw and hesitated but paid $1.70 extra vs 30 cents for small to my set for an upsize Large coleslaw

Guess what I got ? A L size tub ! Content is less than 1/2 !!

So misleading & I may be able to take it to CASEâ€¦

Please review if this Is only ridiculous due to mismanagement at this outlet only!

Service staff were very sweet and friendly, was asking about how busy the outlet was and they were kind to answer my curious queries. I observed also for self service, they were very nice to let the customer know that their numbers were up and also helped them bring their food to the table. Nice friendly team, really recommended Popeyes outlet!

Follow us on IG @toofoodtomiss for more foodie content!

I dine here almost 1 or 2 times per month, central location, near to Novena MRT station.

I enjoyed the food, except All sizes coleslaw & mashed potato are not fully filled up.
Order set menu (chicken, mashed potato, and drink), they served it for about 10 minutes. You can order directly to self ordering kiosk. I got table with no queue in my last visit.
